snippet: The Blackstone Group said on Wednesday that it had named Joseph Baratta, one of its senior deal makers, as the head of its global private equity operations.
abstract: The Blackstone Group said on Wednesday that it had named Joseph Baratta, one of its senior deal makers, as the head of its global private equity operations.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Blackstone Names Baratta as Global Private Equity Head
